getedgeinspect.description: Link to tell the user 'Get Edge Inspect CC.'

gettingstartedconnectingautodiscovery.message: The device running Edge Inspect will look for computers also running Edge Inspect. Tap the computer you would like to connect to. Enter the passcode into the Chrome Extension. This creates a wireless connection between your computer and device

gettingstartedconnectingmanualconnection.message: If you can't find the computer you want to connect to, tap the "+" button to perform a Manual Connect. A list of IP Addresses associated with your computer is located at the bottom of the Chrome Extension. Insert the IP Address into the text field on the device.
When a device is connected, Edge Inspect will prevent the screen from dimming or going to sleep.

gettingstartedintro.description: intro text for the getting started guide
gettingstartedintro.message: $arg1$ is for web designers and developers targeting mobile browsers. After installing Edge Inspect, you will be able to pair devices, have them browse in sync with your computer, perform remote inspection/debugging and see HTML/CSS/JavaScript changes instantly on your device.

gettingstartedremoteinspection.message: In the Chrome Extension, click on the "< >" button next to the device you'd like to inspect or debug and the Developer Tools window will open; you can use remote inspection on one device at a time.

gettingstartedremoteinspectionheader.message: 3. Inspecting & debugging the page on your device

gettingstartedsamenetwork.message: Edge Inspect requires your computer and devices to be on the same network. Computer and devices must be on the same subnet for auto-discovery. If you cannot see your computer, try a Manual Connection.

gettingstartedsamenetworkheader.message: 1. Ensure Devices are on the Same Network

manifest_description.message: Wirelessly connect multiple iOS & Android devices to your computer. Synchronously browse, inspect & debug on devices.

problems.description: menu item to report a problem

progress_tt.description: tooltip for screenshot progress button image

remove.description: menu item to list and/or remove authorized devices

removetext.message: Deauthorize a device to prevent automatic reconnection.
